name: Super Extreme Baseball Amplified 2018
description:
Super Extreme Baseball Amplified 2018 is a game I made in three days for a job interview.  It's main mode is a sandbox where baseballs are being pitched from all around you. There's also a training mode that lets you pitch a baseball from a pitching machine.  Your best score will be sent to a database every 30 seconds.

This project won't be developed any further.
Feel free to ask any questions.

Instructions:
Hold the right mouse button to swing your bat and move it to try and strike the baseball.
Pressing F in training mode will pitch the baseball.
You can also press the Spacebar key to orbit around the ball after striking it.
